info.title: Janun API
info.description: REST API for Janun Backend Service by Team QuantumGuys

tags.name: Profile
tags.description:
Endpoints for user profile.

## Public Endpoints:
- **/profile/{username}:** Gets the profile by username.
## Private Endpoints:
- **/profile:** Gets the user's profile.
- **/profile:** Updates the user's profile. Requires login.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description:
Endpoints for user authentication.

## Public Endpoints:
- **/register:** Registers a new user.
- **/check-username:** Checks if the username is available.
- **/login:** Logs in a user.
- **/forgot-password:** Sends a reset password token to the user's email.
- **/reset-password:** Resets the user's password using the token.
- **/confirm:** Confirms the user's email using the token.

After user registration, a confirmation email will be sent. If a GET request is made to `/confirm?token=` with the email token, the email will be confirmed.

If a POST request is made to `/forgot-password` with an email/username in the email field, a reset-password token will be sent to that user. If a POST request is made to `/reset-password` with that token and a new password, the password will be reset.

For other endpoints, login is required. If you provide the old and new password to `/change-password`, the password will be changed. If a GET request is made to `/logout`, the token will be removed from the cookie.

## Private Endpoints:
- **/user:** Gets the user details. Requires login.
- **/change-password:** Changes the user's password. Requires login.
- **/resend-email:** Resends the confirmation email. Requires login.
- **/logout:** Logs out the user.

tags.name: Channel
tags.description:
Channel API
## Public Endpoints:
- **/channel:** Get all channels
- **/channel/{slug}:** Get channel by slug
- **/channel/{slug}/posts:** Get posts in a channel
## Private Endpoints:
- ### User
- **/channel/{slug}/subscribe:** Subscribe to a channel
- **/channel/{slug}/unsubscribe:** Unsubscribe from a channel
- ### Admin
- **/channel:** Create a new channel
- **/channel/{slug}:** Delete a channel
- ### Manager
- **/channel/{slug}:** Update a channel

tags.name: My
tags.description: Endpoints for related things for user

post.description: Unsubscribe from a channel. If user is not subscribed to any thread in the channel then nothing will happen. Otherwise, user will be unsubscribed from all threads in the channel.
Subscribe to a channel. If user is subscribed to any thread in the channel then nothing will happen. Otherwise, user will be subscribed to all threads in the channel.

get.description: Get all threads in a channel

Resend the confirmation email to the user's email
Logout the user by deleting the token cookie
Login with (username or email) and password
Send a password reset link to the user's email. Username or email can be used to send the link.
Confirm the user's email using the token sent to the user's email

Get all posts in a channel
